title: Lost 30lp, what is this system
body:
Right now it seems this is how it works for me

Game: Match with players with similar skill
*WIN* Game: Ok, good, +15LP
Game: Match with players with similar skill
*WIN* Game: k, Prepare for next game bitch!, +15LP
Game: Ok you win against people on your skill level, but if I give you worse opponents but much worse allies CAN YOU CARRY!?
*LOSE* Game: You couldn't carry with crappy teammates, so clearly you don't belong at a higher ranking, -32LP, TRY AGAIN.
